item.title: php modules location
item.description: Check the current extension directory with: php-config --extension-dir and you can change it by setting extension_dir in php.ini: extension_dir="/usr/lib64/php/modules" Don't forget to restart Apache. See https://serverfault.com/questions/316156/change-php-modules-directory
